content.value: public ValueTask<RunSummary> Run(IXunitTestMethod testMethod, IReadOnlyCollection<IXunitTestCase> testCases, ExplicitOption explicitOption, IMessageBus messageBus, ExceptionAggregator aggregator, CancellationTokenSource cancellationTokenSource, object?[] constructorArguments)

Public Function Run(testMethod As IXunitTestMethod, testCases As IReadOnlyCollection(Of IXunitTestCase), explicitOption As ExplicitOption, messageBus As IMessageBus, aggregator As ExceptionAggregator, cancellationTokenSource As CancellationTokenSource, constructorArguments As Object()) As ValueTask(Of RunSummary)

parameters.description: The test method to be run.
The test cases to be run. Cannot be empty.
A flag to indicate how explicit tests should be treated.
The message bus to report run status to.
The exception aggregator used to run code and collect exceptions.
The task cancellation token source, used to cancel the test run.
The constructor arguments for the test class.

summary: The test method runner for xUnit.net v3 tests.
